wishes.text: On the occasion of my son’s birthday, I am inviting you to dinner at my residence.
On the occasion of my daughter’s birthday, I am inviting you to dinner at my residence.
I am looking forward to our presence on my birthday. The party is being organised at <venue>. Be there by <time>.
Dinner and Drink, food getting colder; All are waiting for you in the party as I have turned a day older.
I am holding the wildest party for you guys, plz be at <venue> by <time> to cut cake and let your body shake.
Here I invite all my friends to be the part of my birthday party on <date> at <time> for dinner and party.
Hey friends, this is a formal invitation to all of you. Plz come at <venue> in the evening to wish me happy birthday and enjoy dinner.
It's the birthday of our beloved son, and You are invited to have a share in our joy as we celebrate the day with our friends and family!
It's the birthday of our beloved daughter, and You are invited to have a share in our joy as we celebrate the day with our friends and family!
We'll be chippin', dippin',and margarita sippin' as we celebrate my Birthday Join us for margaritas and munchies <time> <date> <venue>
